### 1. Load Data

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
fish <- read_csv("data/Gaeta_etal_CLC_data.csv")
fish
```

### 2. Transform Data to only include variables lakeid and length

```{r}
fishlength <- select(fish, lakeid, length)
fishlength
```

### 3. Filter fish data to include samples from lake "BO"

```{r}
bo_fish <- filter(fish, lakeid == "BO")
bo_fish
```

### 4. Calculate the mean length of fish from lake "BO".

```{r}
mean(bo_fish$length)
```
